channel.title: I know this is a noob question but
channel.description: The tutorial I was using on how to edit the starting message when you log-in into the game doesn't work for me. I was wondering if anyone could explain how to do this or redirect me to a tutorial.

item.title: I know this is a noob question but
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Post a link to the tutorial you’re using as well as the source that you’re using.

Read full topic
item.source: I know this is a noob question but

item.title: I know this is a noob question but
item.dc:creator: @metalbeat metalbeat
item.description:
@metalbeat wrote:

Im using 317 delta, and I am referring to the chatbox. The tutorial told me to search setSidebarInterface(0, 2423) in the client.java and underneath it I would find this: sendMessage("####"); but when I search it finds no such thing.

Read full topic
item.source: I know this is a noob question but

item.title: I know this is a noob question but
item.dc:creator: @serversdownload serversdownload

item.title: I know this is a noob question but
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Link the tutorial that you were using. Do you mean the message on the log-in screen before the “Click here to Play Now” or whatever, or a message that a player receives upon logging into the server like in the chatbox? Also, what is the base + revision that you are using?

Read full topic
